Posts.EditableText: If you've got a screenshot, you can upload to imgur or somewhere and paste a link here to show people. I believe this forum allows you to use markdown/reddit type image links that look like: `![Imgur](https://i.imgur.com/whatever-the-link-to-your-image-is.png)` if you want to show an image in a post here.
